name: Drink (AspectWaltz)
description:
Drink

This is a very small project developed for The Indie Tales Jam.

Controls

A/D - steer

W/S - speed

Q/E/RMB

A note on tools

All art and sounds in this game were designed or synthesized by Aspect Waltz. Tools used: GMS2, LMMS, Audacity, Aseprite, MagicaVoxel

The rendering is performed using a technique called sprite-stacking. The ocean waves and "explosions" were synthesized from white noise generated using a triple oscillator and applying effects.
